metadata.name: Glow Friend #1
metadata.description: Glow Friends is a community driven collection of 1300 stylistically curated NFTs existing on the Ethereum Blockchain. Your Glow Friends doubles as your GF membership card, and grants access to members-only benefits like exclusive airdrops, raffles, community giveaways, and more. Each unique Glow Friends collectible comes in a joyful range of colors and traits. Some rarer than others, but all aesthetically vibing for a good time. Always optimised on cheap $GAS for the community! Visit www.glowfriends.io for more details.
